name: Craft an Iron Axe
rationale: Craft an Iron Axe to chop wood more efficiently and use it as a weapon.
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Iron Ingots and 2 Sticks in the correct pattern to make an Iron Axe.

plan.goal: Collect Logs to make Wooden Planks and Sticks
plan.action_nl: Find nearby trees and collect at least 3 logs using your hand or any tool. Convert some of the logs into Wooden Planks and then craft 2 Sticks.
plan.expected: At least 2 sticks are in your inventory.
plan.notes: Logs can come from any tree (Oak, Birch, Spruce). Each log makes 4 planks. Each pair of planks makes 4 sticks.

plan.action_nl: Find and mine at least 3 Iron Ore blocks from caves or hillsides using a Stone Pickaxe.
preconditions: Access to cave or exposed stone area
plan.expected: 3 or more Iron Ore blocks collected.
plan.notes: Iron Ore appears below Y=64. Avoid mining directly down. Bring torches if entering caves.

plan.goal: Smelt Iron Ore into Iron Ingots
plan.action_nl: Use a Furnace to smelt the Iron Ore into Iron Ingots using Coal or Charcoal as fuel.
preconditions: At least 1 fuel source (coal, charcoal, or wood)
plan.notes: Each Iron Ore produces one Iron Ingot. One piece of coal can smelt up to 8 items. Use raw material names for smelting - iron_ore not iron_ingot.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Iron Ingots and 2 Sticks in an 'L' shape pattern to craft an Iron Axe.
plan.expected: An Iron Axe is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Place the Iron Ingots in the top-left, top, and middle-left slots, and Sticks in the center and bottom-middle.

plan.goal: Verify and use the Iron Axe
plan.action_nl: Equip the Iron Axe and chop down a tree to confirm it works properly.
plan.expected: You successfully chop a log using the Iron Axe.
plan.notes: The Iron Axe is faster and more durable than wooden or stone tools. Keep it for building and combat.

name: Craft a Diamond Pickaxe
rationale: Craft a Diamond Pickaxe to mine obsidian and other rare materials efficiently.
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Diamonds and 2 Sticks to make a Diamond Pickaxe.

plan.action_nl: Find nearby trees and collect logs, then craft sticks.
plan.expected: At least 2 sticks are in your inventory.
plan.notes: Sticks are needed for the handle.

plan.action_nl: Find and mine at least 3 diamond ore blocks from deep underground (Y < -58) using an Iron Pickaxe or better.
preconditions: Iron Pickaxe or better in inventory
plan.notes: Diamonds only spawn below Y=-58. You MUST use an Iron Pickaxe or better.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table to combine 3 Diamonds and 2 Sticks in a 'T' shape pattern.
plan.expected: A Diamond Pickaxe is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Diamond Pickaxe can mine obsidian and is very durable.

name: Craft a Stone Sword
rationale: Craft a Stone Sword for combat and self-defense.
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 2 Cobblestone and 1 Stick to make a Stone Sword.

plan.action_nl: Mine stone blocks using a wooden pickaxe to get cobblestone.
Convert logs into planks and then craft a stick.
plan.notes: Swords only need 1 stick, not 2 like most tools.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table with 2 cobblestone above 1 stick in a vertical line.
plan.expected: A Stone Sword is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Swords are for combat. Axes can also be used as weapons.

name: Craft a Wooden Hoe
rationale: Craft a Wooden Hoe to till soil for farming.
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 2 Planks and 2 Sticks to make a Wooden Hoe.

plan.action_nl: Collect logs and convert them into planks and sticks.
plan.expected: At least 2 planks and 2 sticks in inventory.
plan.notes: Hoes require 2 planks and 2 sticks in a specific pattern.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table with planks and sticks in hoe pattern.
plan.expected: A Wooden Hoe is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Hoes are used to till dirt into farmland for crops.

name: Craft a Gold Shovel
rationale: Craft a Gold Shovel for fast digging (though not durable).
actual: Use a Crafting Table to combine 1 Gold Ingot and 2 Sticks to make a Gold Shovel.

plan.action_nl: Convert logs into planks and then craft 2 sticks.
plan.notes: Sticks are needed for the handle.

plan.action_nl: Find gold ore and smelt it into gold ingots.
plan.expected: At least 1 gold ingot in inventory.
plan.notes: Gold requires iron pickaxe or better to mine.

plan.action_nl: Use a Crafting Table with 1 gold ingot above 2 sticks.
plan.expected: A Gold Shovel is added to your inventory.
plan.notes: Gold tools are fast but not durable. Good for quick digging projects.
